reuters.title: BUNDESBANK SEES NO REASON TO CHANGE MONETARY COURSE - VICE-PRESIDENT SCHLESINGER
reuters.body: Shr 63 cts vs 89 cts Net 3,425,216 vs 3,370,682 Avg shrs 5,421,330 vs 3,803,425 NOTE: net for both qtrs reflects gains on sales of securities of 1,755,137, or 51 pct of net, in 1987; and 3,001,222, or 89 pct of net in 1986. Reuter 
